imgCaption: Practicing some tunes! I'm a self-taught trumpet (and guitar) player, though practice time is getting rarer lately.
Playing with my college band. Our gigs often broke the rules, but that's what made them fun.
Caught in my natural habitat. Troubleshooting my personal PC just for the fun of it.
Not sure where I was headed, but I'm definitely showing up looking sharp.
Posing next to a legend at the museum - ¡hasta la victoria siempre!
Just a casual reminder that good lighting is my best friend.
Turns out, I'm slightly taller than some zoo bears. Science confirms it.
My SO gave me an entire box of Mazapán. I've never felt more loved.
Found a blue mascot at the zoo. Had to flex with him.
This sunset, this tree, this moment - nature wins again.
Geared up for a week-long music trip. Suit up, tune up!
Even a responsible adult deserves a colorful night out.
